scripts.start:web: env-cmd -e dev-web --use-shell "npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm run ng:serve -- -c dev-web --proxy-config proxyconfig.json --host 0.0.0.0"
scripts.start:web-prod: env-cmd -e prod-web --use-shell "npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm run ng:serve -- -c prod-web --proxy-config proxyconfig.json"
scripts.start:electron: env-cmd -e dev-electron --use-shell "electron-rebuild && npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm-run-all -p ng:serve:electron electron:serve"
scripts.build:web: npm run wasm-build && env-cmd -e prod-web --use-shell "npm run build-custom-build-scripts && ng build -c prod-web "
scripts.build:web-with-stats: npm run wasm-build && env-cmd -e prod-web --use-shell "npm run build-custom-build-scripts && ng build -c prod-web --stats-json"
scripts.build:electron:win64: env-cmd -e prod-electron --use-shell "npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm run prepackage-electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 x64"
scripts.build:electron:win32: env-cmd -e prod-electron --use-shell "npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm run prepackage-electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 ia32"
scripts.build:electron:win-arm64: env-cmd -e prod-electron --use-shell "npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm run prepackage-electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 arm64"
scripts.build:electron:linux64: env-cmd -e prod-electron --use-shell "npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm run prepackage-electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux x64"
scripts.build:electron:linux32: env-cmd -e prod-electron --use-shell "npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm run prepackage-electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 ia32"
scripts.prepackage-electron: ng build -c prod-electron && npm run electron:tsc && node custom-build-scripts/dist/create-dist-package.js && npm run electron-npm-i && node custom-build-scripts/dist/remove-comp-warning-template.js
scripts.electron:serve: wait-on http-get://localhost:8202/ && npm run electron:tsc && electron . --serve --inspect=5858

developmentInfo: For Development you should use the local version of shared-cops to use live reload from the libary
